---
Help: Het item in de response van GET /schedule/ancestor/{ancestor}/next heeft een starttijd in de toekomst en heeft het gegeven object als ancestor.
Suites: NPOAPI-26, RG
Test
---
!*> Test-specific items
!define midAncestor {POMS_S_NPO_8138042}
*!
|script                                                                      |
|$now=   |value of                 |!today (d-M-yyyy H:mm:ss)                |
|$nowIso=|convert datetime         |$now               |to iso               |
|get from|${urlFrontendApi}/schedule/ancestor/${midAncestor}/next?now=$nowIso|

!4 Item in response has starttime in future

|script                                                   |
|$start=    |json path    |start                          |
|$starttime=|convert epoch|$start    |to datetime         |
|ensure     |datetime     |$starttime|is greater than|$now|

!4 Item in response has given object as ancestor

|script                                                  |
|$midNext=   |json path|midRef                           |
|Check object|$midNext |is a descendant of|${midAncestor}|
